name: Minecraft Basics In Herobrine And Minecraft School
name_original: Minecraft Basics In Herobrine And Minecraft School
description:
So, this is the original, unedited Minecraft's Basics mod that started what would later become the minecraft's basics series! It originally came out sometime in June 2018, and was the first mod in the minecraft's basics series. It is called Minecraft Basics In Herobrine And Minecraft School, and was a collab between me and fogdoggy. Enjoy playing this mod from the past, but keep in mind it might be hard!

Mods So Far In The Minecraft's Basics Series (In Order): Minecraft Basics In Herobrine And Minecraft School Minecraft Basics: Steve's Birthday Bash! Ender Dragon's Basics In Portals And Flames Minecraft Basics 3: Herobrine's Return Minecraft's Basics 4: Into Creeper Cave
